# CollisionComponent.Mode.colliding

**Case**

An environmental collision object.

## Declaration

```swift
case colliding
```

## Discussion

Enabling this flag allows collision objects to interact with dynamic rigid bodies without requiring an extra physicsBody component.
title: CollisionComponent.Mode.colliding
